benchmark_details.name: FTII-Bench (Flow Text with Image Insertion Benchmark)
benchmark_details.overview: FTII-Bench is designed to comprehensively assess the performance of existing large vision-language models (LVLMs) on a complex task of selecting suitable images for insertion into flowing text, requiring image comprehension, instruction understanding, and long-text interpretation.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide a comprehensive evaluation resource for assessing the performance of large vision-language models on the Flow Text with Image Insertion task.

data.source: Manually collected from news articles, specifically from Xinhua News and BBC News.
data.annotation: High-quality image-text sequences based on professional news reporting.

methods: Evaluation of models via accuracy metrics, including the accuracy when images are inserted and not inserted.
methodology.calculation: Calculated by comparing the predicted image insertion order against the ground truth sequences.
methodology.interpretation: Higher accuracy indicates better performance of the vision-language model in selecting suitable images.
methodology.validation: Evaluated performance of 9 open-source LVLMs and 2 closed-source LVLMs.
